text:
Attention: You need to add a denim dress to your fall wardrobe.

The denim dress is arguably the most wearable, versatile and easy garment. You simply put it on, add boots, sneakers or flats, grab a jacket and a standout accessory, then you're done....

Read More On... E!
title: Rihanna's Denim Dress Is More Versatile Than You Think
